text:
When I use the variable element, the value for variable-class element is
required. This is an optional element and if not given, java.lang.String should
be taken as the default value. This does not occur. The className variable in
createVariable method of org.apache.jasper.compiler.TagLibraryInfoImpl ( line
number:471 ) is initialized to null. This has to be changed to 
java.lang.String. Hope this helps to fix the bug.
creator: saravanan@india.adventnet.com
